entries.korText:
지속 피해가 에너지 보호막에 막히지 않음
생명력이 최대가 아닐 때, 1초마다 마나의 #%를 [Sacrifice|희생]하여 동일한 양의 생명력 회복

Damage over Time bypasses your [EnergyShield|Energy Shield]

entries.engText: #% chance to gain a [Charges|Power Charge] on [HitDamage|Hit]

entries.engText: [ESRecharge|Energy Shield Recharge] is not interrupted by Damage if Recharge began [Recently]

entries.engText: Areas which contain [ContainsBreach|Breaches] have #% chance to contain an additional [ContainsBreach|Breach]
